typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		A1 as short,
		A2 as string,
		A3 as string,
		A4 as integer,
		A5 as short,
		A6 as short,
		A7 as short,
		A8 as short,
		A9 as short,
		A10 as double,
		A11 as short,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as double,
		A14 as short,
		A15 as string,
		A16 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dbo.district.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DistrictData
DistrictData derive(insert_date = currentTimestamp(),
		modified_date = currentTimestamp(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumns
